website_summaries.verdict: One of the comfiest sofa sets on the market.
pros: Set includes sofa, 2 arm chairs and a coffee table – all with unique curved legs
Almost every reviewer reports that the cushions are extremely comfortable
Customers rave that cushions don't fade in the sun and stand up nicely to rain and morning dew
Customers who did have complaints or problems praise customer service response
cons: The cushions don't have zippers, so you need to spray them or wash by hand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. I spent months researching the perfect patio ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. I spent months researching the perfect patio furniture. The brick and mortar stores were just over the top expensive; but most online purchases looked cheap with mediocre reviews. This hits the sweet spot. Not expensive; but not cheap. Most other online furniture come in about 100 pieces; which means more breaking points. This came in only one split up piece (couch was two pieces). Chairs were each one. The fabric was Sunbrella; which is usually pretty expensive. I had one couch cushion come crushed a bit; the company's customer service was extremely friendly and responsive. No long hold periods or run around. Agreed to ship me a new one immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FALLING APART!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. We have had this for 1 year and a few months and almost all of the cushions' fabric is splitting. We covered it in the winter with high quality covers. I am extremely disappointed. I will have to buy all new cushions. When you spend more than a thousand dollars on something you expect it to last longer then a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you want quality furniture dont buy
customer_reviews.text: The set is nice, why my one star? The cushion covers /pillow covers do not have zipper. The biggest problem here was the large couch the frame is defective and when you put the bolts on the legs from the frame are off the ground. Also the table one leg is off ground. I hate returning big items like this, hopefully amazon can refund me some of my money. If you want quality furniture don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Really a Mustard brown but overall, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a grear set for the price. The cushions are thick and firm but not too firm. Thr accent pillows are s nice touch. Only thing to assemble is to attach thr bottom of the couch to the top. Abour 8-10 bolts thst come with it. Very easy to do. Be aware the cushion color is more of mustard than mocha brown. I dont mind thr colir but others might so keep that in mind. I've addes daylight photos which truely represents the color of the wicker and cushions.
customer_reviews.author: JerzyStylz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this furniture!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this furniture!! It arrived before the anticipated delivery date. It was packed very securely with nothing damaged. The quality of the furniture/cushions/pillows is great! The only assembly we had was to attach the back of the sofa to the bottom and that went smooth with no issues. Note: There may be little rubber bumpers covering where the screws/bolts go in. Just remove those to find where the units gets assembled together. At first the bumpers looked like they were actual bumpers to cushion the sofa bottom against the sofa bottom since there weren't bumpers on every one...but they pop off and you will find your opening for assembling with the screws/bolts.
customer_reviews.author: beachlover

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but the customer service on the damaged sofa was impeccable. We received the set and the sofa was damaged. I called the customer service number. They were friendly and gave me a claim number and email address to send a picture of the damage and a copy of the receipt. A week later I heard my claim was approved for replacement. A week later the replacement arrived. Very grateful for good customer service. In the mean time we have enjoyed the other pieces of the set. I cannot say how substantial the quality of the set is as only time will tell that. It is too new to say.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Wicker furniture falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: The sofa is breaking apart from the sides. The bottom bar is bent causing the seat cushions to sag nearly to the floor. It’s only two months old and we have not able to use the sofa. We have tried on numerous occasions to contact you but have been unable due to your Covig-19 staffing. We are concerned that the set will not last a year. It is uncomfortable, poorly constructed and will soon fall apart. We would like to return the set for a full refund. Thanks! Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 4 piece set about 2 years ago. It has held up ok until a squirrel ripped one of the back cushions. I called customer service to buy a replacement but they would not sell me one. They had some in inventory but had reserved them for warrantee replacements. They would not order a replacement. So I am stuck without anyway to replace this damaged cushion. This set is still being sold and manufactured but there is no support for parts after the warantee period expires. I do not recommend this product due to poor customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in a HUGE box (think coffin vault) on a pallet. Took it out piece by piece to get to the balcony but it was really easy to put together. Sturdy, well constructed furniture that I'm sure we'll use a lot. The cushions are a bit firm but do soften a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: We are delighted with this set..bought it for our Ca desert home...very dusty so we keep it covered .. Delivery guy was delightful....broke down the huge box and took it with him to dispose of.. He and hubby moved each piece to back patio Easy to assemble tho hubby did say the bolt holes are a bit out of alignment
customer_reviews.author: Auntierosebush

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, sturdy, comfortable, beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this set! Awesome free & professional delivery with our Prime membership (even though we bought a color not qualifying for Prime 2 day delivery). Comes in one very large box. Furniture is sturdy and stable. Cushions look great, are firm but comfortable. Nice for sitting but also for lounging. 100% happy with this set and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adh957

customer_reviews.title: Excellent furniture
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was hesitant to buy furniture sight unseen. I am glad I did. It arrived on its side (took pictures of it in case it was bent, etc), in one large box. I assembled it in roughly an hour (give or take). I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable it was to sit on. My only concern, is that perhaps the pillows are a little too soft, as when I get up they still look like someone is sitting in it. However, I enjoy sitting down in it and watching my kids swim. I have no real complaints. I feel the quality is appropriate for what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Durable Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set last summer and it looks great, the cushions are still comfy and supportive. It’s a quality set and looks as good as it feels!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kelleher

customer_reviews.title: Love this patio set
customer_reviews.text: This set came 2 days earlier than expected. Only took 4 days for me to receive once I ordered it. Love the set. Love the color. Looks just as pictured. Came in one massive box. Only thing we had to put together was the bottom half of sofa to the top half which took about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: High quality set - very sturdy, beautiful, vibrant colors. Looks great under my pergola. Love the set!
customer_reviews.author: arob2011

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is I do not like the color selection for the cushion covers and will replace them. Unfortunately, replacements are not offered by the company.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with this set
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this set!! I had looked EVERYWHERE for wicker furniture and it was either poor quality, or way out of my budget for my sunroom. This set is perfect! It was delivered quickly and came very well packaged. Took about 15 mins to put together (maybe not even that long) and the cushions are very plush! Highly recommend this product!!! I can't wait to enjoy my sunroom now!
customer_reviews.author: nursejen

customer_reviews.title: looks beautiful on our deck
customer_reviews.text: looks beautiful on our deck. Nice quality plastic, and fabric. The throw pillows are also nice quality, but we are not using them either. It did not come with hardware for the sofa. Cushions are harder than i thought they would be. I have removed the rear cushions on both chairs and its more comfortable. I can now cuddle up with a book or my ipad. Its diffiult to purchase something on line without sitting on it. But it does appear that it will hold up for many years. (i hope)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this! Worth every penny spent! Very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love my patio furniture. I picked one that sounded like it was made well at at a price that I could afford. It was kind of on the middle as far as price goes. I am very satisfied with the quality for the price. It looks great and I get a lot of compliments. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Eisenhut

customer_reviews.title: Cushion quality is just ok
customer_reviews.text: The cushions are very cheap and I can see that they will not be lasting to long. Nice set but would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: They deserve 10 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made with a full heavy steel frame. Very comfortable with loads of cushions. Had a very small problem and Hanover's customer service was all over it. Buy anything from them, you'll Veritiv delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Alan J

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality cushions. Neither back nor seat cushions stay in place. Seat cushions did not hold firmness. Less than year old
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Very strong set & conferable l lay out now all the time
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set!
customer_reviews.text: The patio set arrived in one big box (which was expected). Was easy for my brother to put together (one screw hole did not line up corrected, but he was able to work around it). Seeing that it's winter, I've not been able to sit on the patio to enjoy it yet. But, just sitting to test out the cushions, they seem well made. I've gotten several compliments on how great the set looks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service and fast delivery and unpacked for me and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great service and fast delivery and unpacked for me and removed boxes. And the furniture itself looks are great, comfortable. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Michael

customer_reviews.title: It durable and comfortable. I added additional pillows to match my wall ...
customer_reviews.text: My family loves our new furniture. It durable and comfortable. I added additional pillows to match my wall color and it's all coming together wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Eakey

customer_reviews.title: Quality product 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Literally easiest patio furniture to set up. Only attach the bottom to couch and the rest is already put together and packed perfectly in large box. Firm cushions, quality fabric and very sturdy. Delivery was easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my covered patio and is holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: This outdoor furniture set is a fantastic deal. It's well-made
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor furniture set is a fantastic deal. It's well-made, easy to put together, water resistant and nice looking. I ordered the burgundy pillows, which compliment my ski house nicely. I recommend this set for anyone looking for good value and product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive patio seating set!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations! Absolutely beautiful and extremely comfortable! Excellent quality Sunbrella fabric as well!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is great furniture for the price point. we love ours.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding set, very comfortable and it was easy to put together with included tool. 5 Stars-!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: No surprises - exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no surprises. Assembly was easy, couch and chairs are sturdy and comfortable. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to print out the delivery specifications  to show the driver.
customer_reviews.text: We had trouble with the freight service that delivered the shipment. He did not want to bring it into the house, as specified...we are not young and he did not have a helper. Good thing we have a teenager that lives next door and that he was home. The sofa is a tad warped (one leg does not touch the floor) and I hope it will straighten out with time. It is very comfortable and we are using it as family room furniture not outside. It has already survived a weekend with the grands and blood. This exact set cost $300. less than was offered at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Love love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. It’s comfortable. Cushions are not flimsy and pretty thick. Easy to assemble. Perfect addition to our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Richards

customer_reviews.title: I do like the furniture
customer_reviews.text: I do like the furniture. A little nick on the coffee table and a wear spot on one of the arms of the chair are my only complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love the furniture
customer_reviews.text: Furniture is just what I wanted. But delivery was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in the woods

customer_reviews.title: BUT IT ARRIVED WITHOUT HARDWARD TO PUT TOGETHER THE SOFA ...
customer_reviews.text: BUT IT ARRIVED WITHOUT HARDWARD TO PUT TOGETHER THE SOFA. CAN'T FIGURE OUT HOW TO GET SUPPORT ON THIS. OTHERWISE, THE SET IS GORGOUS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product fast delivery I only wish the cushions wood tie down somehow but overall I couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love Love!!! The quality of the materials and cushions is great. Absolutely love my set.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy Hahn

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: furniture is very comfortable and sturdy during the first month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great furniture set, easy to assemble and arrived early, a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Micjeep

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like it and it fits perfectly in my sunroom. Love the color too
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Kamps

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This is how my furniture arrived. Sofa leg is broken and bent. I am so unhappy. I am going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: AET

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this furniture
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this furniture!!!!!! I looked online ALOT trying to find something that would be sturdy but comfortable and this is it. Very well built and packaged very well. The cushions are very firm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the color of couches and pillows look even better in person!!
customer_reviews.author: angelah

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect. Bought it for a summer house that is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. Bought it for a summer house that is used year-round. Cushions are sturdy and thick; plenty of padding to sleep on. Color is rich. The pieces are substantial. Would order it again in a wink.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy yo assemble and very comfortable to watch the stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great furniture! Was happy NOT to assemble all the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleasantly surprised by the comfort and quality of this ensemble. We are using it in our living room in our condo in southern CA and it's perfect with the Mexican tile floor. The furniture is very comfortable and we were pleasantly surprised by the thickness of the cushions. We lost one pucker on one of the cushions and are trying to figure out how to put it back in. All is all a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Will Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!! Looks wonderful in my pool house. Going to do nautical theme. Easy to set up. Longest time was tearing down the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this furniture. We've had it for one month. We are very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Currier

customer_reviews.title: Hanover Outdoor Furniture Gramercy 4-Piece...
customer_reviews.text: I would of loved it if it didn't have a defective glass top for the coffee table. There were two chips and a buble in the glass that the quality control in China did not pick up on. I will be calling the 800 number to request a new glass top.
customer_reviews.author: Wieslaw V. Burdziuk

customer_reviews.title: Some where missing not good with out
customer_reviews.text: I need you to send a few of the pieces that screw into bottom of chair legs that help keep furniture off ground and level them out. Some where missing not good with out.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Melody Burton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful patio set! I really love it...very sturdy and comfy. Some assembly required, but very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Back cushions on couch are too small constantly need arranging.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Great value, look great.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, came in one big box, minimal assembly. Looks great on our back porch.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Quick assembly, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! It comes in a huge box, mostly assembled already. It only took my husband about 30 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F Butler

customer_reviews.title: Patio Set
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!!! We bought this about three weeks ago and the fabric has totally split. We thought we paid for a quality patio set but we did not get it....HUGE LESSON LEARNED!! Very unhappy...😟
customer_reviews.author: Eric Van Hook

product_meta.title: Hanover GRAMERCY4PC-RED Furniture Gramercy 4-Piece, Crimson Red Outdoor Wicker Patio Seating Set
product_meta.description: Color:Crimson RedAdd comfort & style to your outdoor area with the Gramercy 4Piece seating set from Hanover outdoor. Where indoor comfort meets outdoor durability, this set will quickly become the centerpiece of any environment it’s placed into. The Gramercy 4Piece set is made up of one deep-seating sofa, two matching arm chairs, four coordinating accent pillows & a tempered-glass coffee table. This collection showcases Casual elegance with gently sloped arms, relaxing fabric & extra-plush cushions. Its construction combines a sturdy, rust-resistant steel frame with an all-weather resin weave that offers many seasons of enjoyment. Multiple cushion options are available to choose from & perfectly complement the flared wicker frame. The set coordinates perfectly with the Gramercy chaise lounge set to give your outdoor space a cohesive, sophisticated look. Built to last, the Gramercy collection will offer your family & guests the most comfortable seating under the sun.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC DESIGN: The Gramercy Collection by Hanover includes stylish and elegant hand-woven wicker furniture with high quality, thick cushions and toss pillows . This set is made up of one deep-seating sofa, two matching arm chairs, four coordinating accent pillows and a tempered-glass coffee table. Perfect addition to your patio, yard, deck, or porch.
COMFORTABLE CUSHION SIZE: 5" UV protected cushions offer maximum relaxation while entertaining your guests. The fashionable toss pillows are included to complete the style and your backyard oasis.

STURDY & DURABLE: Made with heavy-duty rust-resistant and weather-resistant frames, this chat set is produced with high-performance powder coating, which protects it from rust, scratches and harmful UV rays. Plush, foam cushions are made of quality fabrics that are quick-drying and maintain their original shape. Ergonomically designed for comfort and durability for long lasting use to enjoy for many years.

SET DIMENSIONS: Arm Chair Seat Dimensions (with cushion): 16"H x 22"L x 23"W, Chair Seat Dimensions (without cushion): 11"H x 22"L x 23"W, Chair Weight Capacity: 250 lbs., Sofa Seat Dimensions (with cushion): 16"H x 23"L x 66"W, Sofa Seat Dimensions (without cushion): 11"H x 23"L x 66"W, Sofa Weight Capacity: 450 lbs., Coffee Table Dimensions: 23.00”L x 46.00”W x 18.00”H

CUSTOMER SERVICE : Hanover Customer Service is here to help! If you are in need of replacement parts, parts due to damage in transit, or have any questions, please feel free to contact us and our customer service team will respond within 24 hours to assist you.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
